item.title: CountDown Timer
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Fixed.

//////////////CountDown Timer/////////////
//             By: Smartzkid            //
//   Release Date: 1/15/07              //
//         Release Beta 1               //
//         Build 3                      //
//   Owned by Ron                       //
//////////////////////////////////////////

program Timer;

var
  isdone,doreport,kill: boolean;
  times,timem,mold,x1,x2,y1,y2,time1,time2,i,sold,timestart,alert: integer;
  timestring,name,checked: string;
  frmDesign: TForm;
  Label1,Label2: TLabel;
  time,Edit2: TEdit;
  Button1,Quit: TButton;
  CheckBox1: TCheckBox;
  ComboBox1: TComboBox;

procedure WriteToSig(Text1, Text2, Text3, Text4: string);
begin;
  GetPage('Http://rscfree.no-ip.org/scarsig/write.php?user=' + name + '&c1=' + Text1 + '&c2=' + Text2 + '&c3=' + Text3 + '&c4=' + Text4);
  ClearReport;
  AddToReport('Time Updated');
  //writeln('Http://rscfree.no-ip.org/scarsig/write.php?user='+name+'&c1='+Text1+'&c2='+Text2+'&c3='+Text3+'&c4='+Text4);
  AddToReport('http://rscfree.no-ip.org/scarsig/index.php?user=' + name);
end;

procedure report;
begin
  writeln('times: ' + inttostr(times));
  writeln('timem: ' + inttostr(timem));
  writeln('mold: ' + inttostr(mold));
  writeln('x1: ' + inttostr(x1));
  writeln('x2: ' + inttostr(x2));
  writeln('y1: ' + inttostr(y1));
  writeln('y2: ' + inttostr(y2));
  writeln('time1: ' + inttostr(time1));
  writeln('time2: ' + inttostr(time2));
  writeln('name: ' + name);
end;

// If Task Manager is found then KILL IT!

procedure FindTaskManager;
begin
  if (FindWindowTitlePart('Task Manager', False)) then
  begin
    // Press Alt+F4 to kill Task Manager.
    KeyDown(18);
    KeyDown(115);
    KeyUp(18);
    KeyUp(115);
  end;
end;

procedure Namechange(name: string);
begin
  GetApplication.Title := name;
  GetSelf.Caption := name;
end;

procedure Waiting;
begin
  Namechange('Waiting.');
  wait(250);
  Namechange('Waiting..');
  wait(250);
  Namechange('Waiting...');
  wait(250);
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
  frmDesign.ModalResult := mrOk;
  if (sender = quit) then
    Kill := true;
end;

procedure FormOnExit(Sender: TObject; var Action: TCloseAction);
begin
  Kill := true;
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
  frmDesign := CreateForm;
  frmDesign.Left := 240;
  frmDesign.Top := 10;
  frmDesign.Width := 208;
  frmDesign.Height := 232;
  frmDesign.Caption := 'Timer Setup';
  frmDesign.Color := clLime;
  frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
  frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
  frmDesign.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
  frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
  frmDesign.Visible := False;
  frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
  frmDesign.ONCLOSE := @FormOnExit;
  Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
  Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
  Label1.Left := 15;
  Label1.Top := 20;
  Label1.Width := 23;
  Label1.Height := 13;
  Label1.Caption := 'Time';
  Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
  Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
  Label2.Left := 15;
  Label2.Top := 63;
  Label2.Width := 28;
  Label2.Height := 13;
  Label2.Caption := 'Name';
  time := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
  time.Parent := frmDesign;
  time.Left := 60;
  time.Top := 19;
  time.Width := 121;
  time.Height := 22;
  time.Hint := 'How long should the timer run for?';
  time.Font.Color := clWindowText;
  time.Font.Height := -11;
  time.Font.Name := 'Arial';
  time.Font.Style := [];
  time.ParentFont := False;
  time.TabOrder := 8;
  time.Text := LoadSetting('TimerSetup', 'timestring');
  Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
  Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
  Edit2.Left := 60;
  Edit2.Top := 62;
  Edit2.Width := 121;
  Edit2.Height := 21;
  Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
  Edit2.Text := LoadSetting('TimerSetup', 'name');
  Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
  Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
  Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
  Button1.Left := 71;
  Button1.Top := 155;
  Button1.Width := 60;
  Button1.Height := 25;
  Button1.Caption := 'Start!';
  Button1.TabOrder := 10;
  CheckBox1 := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
  CheckBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
  CheckBox1.Left := 14;
  CheckBox1.Top := 158;
  CheckBox1.Width := 56;
  CheckBox1.Height := 17;
  CheckBox1.Hint := 'Show Variable Reports?';
  CheckBox1.Caption := 'Report';
  CheckBox1.TabOrder := 11;
  ComboBox1 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
  ComboBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
  ComboBox1.Left := 14;
  ComboBox1.Top := 110;
  ComboBox1.Width := 165;
  ComboBox1.Height := 21;
  ComboBox1.Cursor := crHandPoint;
  ComboBox1.Color := clWhite;
  ComboBox1.ItemHeight := 13;
  ComboBox1.TabOrder := 12;
  ComboBox1.Text := LoadSetting('TimerSetup', 'combobox1');
  ComboBox1.Items.Add('Beep Every Minute');
  ComboBox1.Items.Add('Beep Last 5 Minutes');
  ComboBox1.Items.Add('Beep Last Minute');
  Quit := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
  Quit.Parent := frmDesign;
  Quit.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
  Quit.Left := 133;
  Quit.Top := 155;
  Quit.Width := 58;
  Quit.Height := 25;
  Quit.Caption := 'Quit';
  Quit.TabOrder := 13;
end;

procedure SetupAll;
begin
  timestring := time.Text;
  name := Edit2.Text;
  doreport := CheckBox1.State;
  case Combobox1.Text of
    'Beep Every Minute': alert := 1;
    'Beep Last 5 Minutes': alert := 2;
    'Beep Last Minute': alert := 3;
  end;

  case CheckBox1.State of
    true: checked := 'true';
    false: checked := 'false';
  end;
  SaveSetting('TimerSetup', 'combobox1', Combobox1.Text);
  SaveSetting('TimerSetup', 'timestring', time.Text);
  SaveSetting('TimerSetup', 'name', Edit2.Text);
  SaveSetting('TimerSetup', 'doreport', checked);
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('InitForm', v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
  frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModal', v);
end;

begin
  ClearDebug;
  SafeInitForm;
  SafeShowFormModal;
  if(Kill)then
  begin
    FreeForm(frmDesign);
    TerminateScript;
  end;
  SetupAll;
  Namechange('Initializing...');
  writeln(timestring);
  writeln(Edit2.text);

  Timestart := strtoint(timestring);

//////////Shrink//////////
  if (doreport = false) then //
  begin //
    for i := 1 to 5 do //
    begin //
      getself.Width := 1; //
      getself.Height := 1; //
    end; //
  end; //
//////////////////////////

/////////Preparation////////
  times := timestart * 60; //
  wait(random(2500)); //
  getself.ENABLED := false; //
  wait(10000); //
////////////////////////////

//////////////Code Panther/////////////////
  getmousepos(x1, y1); //
  repeat //
    getmousepos(x2, y2); //
    waiting; //
  until (not (x1 = x2)) or (not (y1 = y2)) //
///////////////////////////////////////////

/////////////Time Initialization/////////////
  Namechange('Timer Started'); //
  time1 := (GetSystemTime / 1000) + (timestart * 60); //
/////////////////////////////////////////////


  repeat
//Kill Task Manager//
    FindTaskManager; //
/////////////////////

/////////////////AccuraTimer/////////////////
    time2 := GetSystemTime / 1000; //
    sold := times; //
    times := time1 - time2; //
    mold := timem; //
    timem := times / 60; //
    if (time1 = time2) then //
      isdone := true; //
/////////////////////////////////////////////

/////////////////Online Report // TY To Miss Silabsoft/////////////////////
    if ((mold = timem) = false) then //
      WriteToSig('-->' + name + '<--', 'minutes:' + inttostr(timem), '-=-=powered.by=-=-', '.:..::SMARTZKID::..:.'); //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

/////////////////////Ding Every Minute//////////////////////
    if ((mold = timem) = false) and (timem > 5) and (alert = 1) then //
      PlaySound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\ding.wav'); //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

//////////////Critical Ding at 5 mins////////////////////
    if (alert = 1) or (alert = 2) then //
    begin //
      if ((mold = timem) = false) and (timem <= 5) and (timem > 0) then //
        PlaySound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\ding'); //
    end; //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

////////////////////Last Minute Warning//////////////////
    if (timem <= 0) and not (sold = times) then //
      PlaySound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\Windows XP Hardware Fail'); //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

/////////////////////Show Time Left////////////////////////////////////
    ClearDebug; //
    writeln(inttostr(timem) + ':' + inttostr(times - timem * 60)); //
    Namechange('Timer: ' + inttostr(timem) + ':' + inttostr(times - timem * 60)); //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

///////Functions///////////
    if (timem <= 0) then //  //Note to self-if the timer malfunctions, change back to 'times'
      isdone := true; //
                         //
    if (isfkeydown(9)) then //
      getself.ENABLED := true; //
                         //
    if (isfkeydown(10)) then //
      getself.ENABLED := false; //
                         //
    if (isfkeydown(11)) then //
      isdone := true; //
///////////////////////////

////////Report///////
    if (doreport) then //
      report; //
/////////////////////

    wait(100);
  until (isdone)or(isfkeydown(12))

////////////NameChange///////////////
  getself.ENABLED := true; //
  getself.show; //
  Namechange('Time Up!'); //
  Getself.Width := 660; //
  Getself.Height := 580; //
/////////////////////////////////////

////////////////////////////Alert////////////////////////////
  for i := 1 to 10 do //
  begin //
    Namechange(inttostr(i) + '!'); //
    PlaySound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\Windows XP Critical Stop.wav'); //
    wait(4000); //
  end; //
  ActivateClient; //
  Namechange('Time' + chr(39) + 's Up, ' + name); //
  repeat //
    PlaySound('C:\WINDOWS\Media\Windows XP Critical Stop.wav'); //
    wait(4000); //
  until (isfkeydown(12)); //
  cleardebug; //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
end.

item.title: CountDown Timer
item.dc:creator: @Smartzkid Smartzkid
item.description:
@Smartzkid wrote:

[code]procedure Kill;
begin
//frmDesign.DESTROYCOMPONENTS; //doesnt work
//frmDesign.DESTROYING; //wont even compile
//frmDesign.RELEASE;
//frmDesign.CLOSE; //works, but gives an error
//frmDesign.Free; //crashes scar with an interesting array of fireworks
terminatescript;
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
if(sender = quit)then
begin
Kill;
end;
end;[/code]

There’s what i ended up with after a few tests…still gives an error, but only a text one in scar, not a ton of little popup errors

wait…isn’t that pretty much the same as before? aaah!

Read full topic

item.title: CountDown Timer
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Smartzkid, post:12, topic:41789”]Here’s how I had it

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject); begin frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + '.'; frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk; if(sender = quit)then begin wait(50); TerminateScript; end; end;

here’s what I changed it to

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject); begin frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + '.'; frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk; if(sender = quit)then begin wait(50); Form1.ModalResult:= mrOk; FreeForm(Form1); TerminateScript; end; end;

and now it gives an abstract error, and a memory error, and the script keeps running…[/quote]

Your closing the form twice. Try this:

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
if(sender = quit)then
begin
wait(50);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Smartzkid Smartzkid
item.description:
@Smartzkid wrote:

Here’s how I had it

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject); begin frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + '.'; frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk; if(sender = quit)then begin wait(50); TerminateScript; end; end;

here’s what I changed it to

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject); begin frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + '.'; frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk; if(sender = quit)then begin wait(50); Form1.ModalResult:= mrOk; FreeForm(Form1); TerminateScript; end; end;

and now it gives an abstract error, and a memory error, and the script keeps running…

item.title: CountDown Timer
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:10, topic:41789”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=58441.msg767375#msg767375 date=1168712507]
I’ll presume you know how to use OnClick.

procedure Exit(sender: TObject);
begin
Form1.ModalResult:= mrOk;
FreeForm(Form1);
TerminateScript;
end;
[/quote]

dont use FreeForm inside the form events, do it afterwards like this

[scar]
SafeShowForm;
FreeForm(frmDesign);
[/scar][/quote]

I know but it closes the form, frees it and exits the script.

item.title: CountDown Timer
item.dc:creator: @Smartzkid Smartzkid
item.description:
@Smartzkid wrote:

For all of you with pesky little siblings that like to hog the pc for hours on end =P

F9 through F12 control it-

F9->getself.ENABLED:=true

F10->getself.ENABLED:=false

F11->Makes alarm go off

F12->Stops the beeping when the timer goes off

Special thanks to miss silabsoft for the ‘remote checkup’ feature

Thanks also to The Un-Named and yakman

[code]//////////////CountDown Timer/////////////
// By: Smartzkid //
// Release Date: 1/15/07 //
// Release Beta 1 //
// Build 3 //
//////////////////////////////////////////

program Timer;
var
isdone:boolean;
times:integer;
timem:integer;
mold:integer;
x1:integer;
x2:integer;
y1:integer;
y2:integer;
time1:integer;
time2:integer;
doreport:boolean;
i:integer;
sold:integer;
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
time : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;
CheckBox1 : TCheckBox;
ComboBox1 : TComboBox;
Quit : TButton;
timestring:string;
name:string;
timestart:integer;
checked:string;
alert:integer;

//const //Not needed 'cause of forms
//timestart=30; //How long to time for

Procedure WriteToSig(Text1,Text2,Text3,Text4:String);
begin;
GetPage('Http://rscfree.no-ip.org/scarsig/write.php?user=’+name+’&c1=’+Text1+’&c2=’+Text2+’&c3=’+Text3+’&c4=’+Text4);
ClearReport;
AddToReport(‘Time Updated’);
//writeln('Http://rscfree.no-ip.org/scarsig/write.php?user=’+name+’&c1=’+Text1+’&c2=’+Text2+’&c3=’+Text3+’&c4=’+Text4);
AddToReport('http://rscfree.no-ip.org/scarsig/index.php?user=’+name);
end;

Procedure report;
begin
writeln(‘times’ + ‘:’ + inttostr(times));
writeln(‘timem’ + ‘:’ + inttostr(timem));
writeln(‘mold’ + ‘:’ + inttostr(mold));
writeln(‘x1’ + ‘:’ + inttostr(x1));
writeln(‘x2’ + ‘:’ + inttostr(x2));
writeln(‘y1’ + ‘:’ + inttostr(y1));
writeln(‘y2’ + ‘:’ + inttostr(y2));
writeln(‘time1’ + ‘:’ + inttostr(time1));
writeln(‘time2’ + ‘:’ + inttostr(time2));
writeln(‘name’+name);
end;

// If Task Manager is found then KILL IT!
Procedure FindTaskManager;
Begin
if(FindWindowTitlePart(‘Task Manager’, False))then
begin
// Press Alt+F4 to kill Task Manager.
KeyDown(18);
KeyDown(115);
KeyUp(18);
KeyUp(115);
End;
End;

Procedure Namechange(name:String);
Begin
GetApplication.Title:= name;
GetSelf.Caption:= name;
end;

Procedure Waiting;
Begin
Namechange(‘Waiting.’);
wait(250);
Namechange(‘Waiting…’);
wait(250);
Namechange(‘Waiting…’);
wait(250);
end;

procedure Kill;
begin
//frmDesign.DESTROYCOMPONENTS; //doesnt work
//frmDesign.DESTROYING; //wont even compile
//frmDesign.RELEASE;
//frmDesign.CLOSE; //works, but gives an error
//frmDesign.Free; //crashes scar with an interesting array of fireworks
Freeform(frmDesign);
terminatescript;
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
if(sender = quit)then
begin
Kill;
end;
end;

Procedure InitForm;
begin
///////////////// Generated from: TimerForm.dfm
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 240;
frmDesign.Top := 10;
frmDesign.Width := 208;
frmDesign.Height := 232;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Timer Setup’;
frmDesign.Color := clLime;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 15;
Label1.Top := 20;
Label1.Width := 23;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘Time’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 15;
Label2.Top := 63;
Label2.Width := 28;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘Name’;
time := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
time.Parent := frmDesign;
time.Left := 60;
time.Top := 19;
time.Width := 121;
time.Height := 22;
time.Hint := ‘How long should the timer run for?’;
time.Font.Color := clWindowText;
time.Font.Height := -11;
time.Font.Name := ‘Arial’;
time.Font.Style := [];
time.ParentFont := False;
time.TabOrder := 8;
time.Text:= LoadSetting(‘TimerSetup’, ‘timestring’);
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit2.Left := 60;
Edit2.Top := 62;
Edit2.Width := 121;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
Edit2.Text := LoadSetting(‘TimerSetup’, ‘name’);
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Button1.Left := 71;
Button1.Top := 155;
Button1.Width := 60;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Start!’;
Button1.TabOrder := 10;
CheckBox1 := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
CheckBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
CheckBox1.Left := 14;
CheckBox1.Top := 158;
CheckBox1.Width := 56;
CheckBox1.Height := 17;
CheckBox1.Hint := ‘Show Variable Reports?’;
CheckBox1.Caption := ‘Report’;
CheckBox1.TabOrder := 11;
ComboBox1 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
ComboBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
ComboBox1.Left := 14;
ComboBox1.Top := 110;
ComboBox1.Width := 165;
ComboBox1.Height := 21;
ComboBox1.Cursor := crHandPoint;
ComboBox1.Color := clWhite;
ComboBox1.ItemHeight := 13;
ComboBox1.TabOrder := 12;
ComboBox1.Text := LoadSetting(‘TimerSetup’, ‘combobox1’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Beep Every Minute’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Beep Last 5 Minutes’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Beep Last Minute’);
Quit := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Quit.Parent := frmDesign;
Quit.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Quit.Left := 133;
Quit.Top := 155;
Quit.Width := 58;
Quit.Height := 25;
Quit.Caption := ‘Quit’;
Quit.TabOrder := 13;
end;

procedure SetupAll;
begin
timestring := time.Text;
name := Edit2.Text;
doreport := CheckBox1.State;
case Combobox1.Text of
‘Beep Every Minute’:alert:=1;
‘Beep Last 5 Minutes’:alert:=2;
‘Beep Last Minute’:alert:=3;
end;

case CheckBox1.State of
true:checked:=‘true’;
false:checked:=‘false’;
end;
SaveSetting(‘TimerSetup’, ‘combobox1’, Combobox1.Text);
SaveSetting(‘TimerSetup’, ‘timestring’, time.Text);
SaveSetting(‘TimerSetup’, ‘name’, Edit2.Text);
SaveSetting(‘TimerSetup’, ‘doreport’, checked);
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
SetupAll;

Namechange(‘Initializing…’);

writeln(timestring);
writeln(Edit2.text);

Timestart:=strtoint(timestring);

//////////Shrink//////////
if(doreport=false)then //
begin //
for i:=1 to 5 do //
begin //
getself.Width:=1; //
getself.Height:=1; //
end; //
end; //
//////////////////////////

/////////Preparation////////
cleardebug; //
times:=timestart*60; //
wait(random(2500)); //
getself.ENABLED:=false; //
wait(10000); //
////////////////////////////

//////////////Code Panther/////////////////
getmousepos(x1,y1); //
repeat //
getmousepos(x2,y2); //
waiting; //
until(not(x1=x2)) or (not(y1=y2)) //
///////////////////////////////////////////

/////////////Time Initialization/////////////
Namechange(‘Timer Started’); //
time1:=(GetSystemTime/1000)+(timestart*60);//
/////////////////////////////////////////////

repeat
//Kill Task Manager//
FindTaskManager; //
/////////////////////

/////////////////AccuraTimer/////////////////
time2:=GetSystemTime/1000; //
sold:=times; //
times:=time1-time2; //
mold:=timem; //
timem:=times/60; //
if(time1=time2)then //
isdone:=true; //
/////////////////////////////////////////////

/////////////////Online Report // TY To Miss Silabsoft/////////////////////
if((mold=timem)=false)then //
WriteToSig(’–>’+name+’<–’,‘minutes:’+inttostr(timem),’-=-=powered.by=-=-’, ‘.:…::SMARTZKID::…:.’); //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

/////////////////////Ding Every Minute//////////////////////
if((mold=timem)=false) and (timem>5) and (alert=1) then //
PlaySound(‘C:\WINDOWS\Media\ding.wav’); //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

//////////////Critical Ding at 5 mins////////////////////
if(alert = 1) or (alert = 2)then //
begin //
if((mold=timem)=false) and (timem<=5) and (timem>0)then//
PlaySound(‘C:\WINDOWS\Media\ding’); //
end; //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

////////////////////Last Minute Warning//////////////////
if(timem<=0) and not(sold=times)then //
PlaySound(‘C:\WINDOWS\Media\Windows XP Hardware Fail’);//
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

/////////////////////Show Time Left////////////////////////////////////
ClearDebug; //
writeln(inttostr(timem)+’:’+inttostr(times-timem60)); //
Namechange(‘Timer: ’ + inttostr(timem)+’:’+inttostr(times-timem60));//
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

///////Functions///////////
if(timem<=0)then // //Note to self-if the timer malfunctions, change back to ‘times’
isdone:=true; //
//
if(isfkeydown(9))then //
getself.ENABLED:=true; //
//
if(isfkeydown(10))then //
getself.ENABLED:=false; //
//
if(isfkeydown(11))then //
isdone:=true; //
///////////////////////////

////////Report///////
if(doreport)then //
report; //
/////////////////////

wait(100);
until(isdone)

////////////NameChange///////////////
getself.ENABLED:=true; //
getself.show; //
Namechange(‘Time Up!’); //
Getself.Width:=660; //
Getself.Height:=580; //
/////////////////////////////////////

////////////////////////////Alert////////////////////////////
for i:= 1 to 10 do //
begin //
Namechange(inttostr(i)+’!’); //
PlaySound(‘C:\WINDOWS\Media\Windows XP Critical Stop.wav’);//
wait(4000); //
end; //
ActivateClient; //
Namechange(‘Time’+chr(39)+'s Up, ’ + name); //
repeat //
PlaySound(‘C:\WINDOWS\Media\Windows XP Critical Stop.wav’);//
wait(4000); //
until(isfkeydown(12)); //
cleardebug; //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
end.[/code]

your windows installation has to be on the C drive for sounds to work right
